title: Blended Learning Instructional Design for Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET): Application of ADDIE and Rapid Prototyping Models

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science knowledge and comprehension of Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) systems
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen competency in designing blended learning based on smartphones in the expanded non-face-to-face education environment post-COVID-19

learning_goals: Design a blended learning course by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (analysis, design, development, implementation, evaluation).
Iteratively improve educational content reflecting learner feedback using the rapid prototyping model.
Develop an evaluation tool considering learners' technology acceptance (TAM) and academic achievement in a TVET blended learning environment in the science field.
Implement effective blended learning strategies even in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

resources: Expert panel for content validity verification
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
